title: Wedding Jitters
description: This is the 5th installment in the Jessica's Seduction series of novellas, and the sizzling erotic action continues to unfold on its pages. Back home in Australia Jessica enlists the help of a wedding planner to organise her big day. All seems to be going to plan until two weeks out from the wedding date. It's only then that she realises not everything is as it seems, and it's a last minute rush to make her dream of marrying Preston a reality. Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
